alert.note: Alert for Newton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 10:09AM EDT until April 05 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM CDT FOR EASTERN NEWTON AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 909 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near DeMotte to near Rensselaer to Goodland, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rensselaer, Remington, Roselawn, Goodland, Brook, Hanging Grove, Collegeville, Mount Ayr, Foresman, Fair Oaks, Parr and Baileys Corner. Including the following interstate... Indiana I-65 between mile markers 200 and 231. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
